about.quote: A dreamer trapped in a finite body, with infinite ideas.
about.p1: I'm Isaac Martinez, a Software Architect and Full Stack Developer based in Santiago, Dominican Republic. I have a strong focus on AI-driven solutions and scalable backend architectures.
about.p2: With over 9 years of experience in Node.js and a deep understanding of cloud technologies like AWS, I build systems that are not only performant but also secure and reliable. I'm passionate about leveraging technology to solve complex business problems.
about.p3: When I'm not coding, I enjoy playing dominoes, photography, and exploring the latest advancements in AI.
